鄒.definition: surname Zou; vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1046-256 BC) in the southeast of Shandong

鄒城.definition: Zoucheng, county-level city in Jining 濟寧|济宁[Ji3 ning2], Shandong

鄒城市.definition: Zoucheng, county-level city in Jining 濟寧|济宁[Ji3 ning2], Shandong

鄒容.definition: Zou Rong (1885-1905), a martyr of the anti-Qing revolution, died in jail in 1905

鄒族.definition: Tsou or Cou, one of the indigenous peoples of Taiwan

鄒衍.definition: Zou Yan (305-240 BC), founder of the School of Yin-Yang of the Warring States Period (475-221 BC)

鄒韜奮.definition: Zou Taofen (1895-1944), journalist, political theorist and publisher
